title: National defense is nonexcludable and nonrival

content.question: National defense is an example of a public good because

choices.label: it requires tax revenues to fund any production
one person’s use of it will decrease another person’s ability to use it
the private market typically produces the socially efficient level of output
the public is protected from invasion

unit.text: 6: Market Failure and the Role of Government

skill.text: Skill 1.B: Identify an economic concept, principle, or model illustrated by an example.
